name: learninsurance - Insurance License Training
tag_list: insurance-license, insurance-licensing, insurance-continuing-education, insurance-school, insurance-exam, insurance-ce, adjuster-license, adjuster-license-course
overview:
learninsurance.com is a premier provider of Insurance Pre-License Courses online and Insurance Continuing Education for your insurance license renewal. Take advantage of the online insurance license training courses and get certified to become a life & health or property & casualty insurance agent, insurance claims adjuster, or take advantage of the insurance designation certifications to get ahead in your insurance career from the convenience of your home or office.

Insurance Adjuster License learninsurance.com an accredited provider of Insurance Adjuster License training online. The Texas Property & Casualty Insurance Adjuster License packages offered will help you become a certified insurance adjuster in the state of your residence or to obtain a non-resident insurance adjuster license by reciprocity of the Texas Adjuster License.

You will be exempted from taking the state exam for adjuster licensing. Complete the 40-hour Insurance Property & Casualty Insurance Adjuster License course and take the online exam followed by the course. You have to score at least 70% on the insurance adjuster exam to pass. Rest assured that the adjuster license course includes everything that is required for any individual looking to become and adjuster and pass the exam.

The coursework features 70% application and 30% memorization. This 70:30 rule will help you get prepared for all field work and give you enough practice so you are ready to process insurance claims and be successful right from the word, Go!

Insurance Agent License (Pre-Licensing) learninsurance.com has served hundreds of individuals who aspired to join one of the biggest financial services industries in the US and who are now well on their way of being successful insurance agents. The Insurance Pre-License exam prep courses are available for Property & Casualty insurance licensing or Life & Health Insurance licensing.

The online pre-licensing courses offer a great way to prepare for the insurance exam. Get yourself registered for the insurance license courses at learninsurance.com, study the interactive coursework, take practice tests, and simulate the actual state exam. This tried and tested technique of providing quality coursework followed by interactive exercises to help you assess yourself with examples and explanations of the correct answers and simulating the final exam is what helps our learners pass the state insurance license exam the first time! Donâ€™t fool yourself; passing the insurance license exam is not an easy job. Thatâ€™s why you need to put your trust in our online insurance pre-licensing solutions. Just go to www.learninsurance.com and select your state from the insurance pre-license section and pick one of the packages that cover all the state requirements for you to become licensed insurance agents. You will find everything you need to become a licensed insurance agent in your state or getting a non-resident insurance license.
